God hona Jedus a whole heap. E call um op weh e dey an e mek um seddown ta e right han fa rule wid um. De Fada God done gii Jedus de Holy Sperit dat e been promise. An wa oona da see an da yeh now, dat de gif ob de Holy Sperit wa Jedus done pour out pon we.
Now ya done come fa be a nyew poson. God mek oona all nyew, an e da mek oona come fa be like um mo an mo. E da do dat so dat one day we gwine know um fa true.
Wen Jedus yeh dat, e say, “Dis ailment yah ain gwine mean dat Lazarus gwine dead. Dis ailment happen fa mek people see God powa an praise um, an so dat de Son ob God gwine git praise.”

Cause de Good Nyews da show we how God da mek all ting right tween people an esef, ef dey bleebe. God da mek um right cause ob dey fait, fom de fus ta de las. Jes like God Book say, “De one wa God mek right wid esef cause e bleebe pon God, dat one gwine hab life.”
An e gone out, da tote e own cross pon e shoulda, til e come ta a place dey call “De place wa stan like a man head.” (De Hebrew people call dat place “Golgotha.”)
So ebrybody able fa do diffunt ting coddin ta how God mek um able fa do wid de powa an sense God gim. Ef God mek we able fa tell oda people God wod, we mus do um coddin ta hommuch fait we got.
De fus ting wa got life look jes like a lion. De secon one look jes like a ox. An de nex one got a face wa look jes like de face ob a man. De las one look jes like a eagle wa da fly.
Oona mus tek cyah how oona da lib oona life. Mus dohn lib like people wa ain got no sense. Mus lib like dem wa got sense.
Cause dey jes one God fa all people, an e da sabe de Jew people an de people wa ain Jew, all een de same way. Dey all blongst ta de same Lawd, an e da bless all dem tommuch wa da call pon um.
God da mek all ting right wid dem wa bleebe pon Christ, an so dey ain got no need no mo fa try fa git right wid God shru de Law.
Mus dohn leh nottin warry oona. Steada dat, pray ta God bout all ting. Wen ya da pray, aks um fa wa ya need, an tell um tankya.
Now den, dem ting yah happen fa waan we dat we ain oughta pit we haat pon ebil ting, like we ole people done.

De staa open op de way ta de deep hole. An plenty smoke come out fom eenside dey, jes like wen dey a great big fire an smoke da come out. De sun ain shine, an de sky been daak, cause de smoke mek de place daak.
Een dem ting yah, no man oughta do e broda wrong. Mus dohn tek wantage ob e broda. We done been tell oona dis fo an waan oona fa true, dat God gwine punish dem wa da do dis kinda sin yah.
Wen somebody come fa be one wid Christ, e a nyew poson. De ole way ob life wa e beena lib done done. E da lib a nyew way ob life now.
Cause de Fada lob e Son an e da show um all wa e da do. E gwine show de Son mo ting wa e fa do wa a whole heap mo betta den dis ting yah. Dem gwine mek oona stonish bout um fa true.
De poson wa beena tief, e mus dohn tief no mo. E mus wok, da do sompin good wid e han, so dat e gwine be able fa hep dem wa hab need.

One oda ting, A wahn ya fa git a room ready fa me. A da look fowaad, cause ob de pray dat oona all da pray ta God fa me, dat e gwine git me outta dis jailhouse so dat A gwine be able fa come ta oona gin.

Mus dohn leh all kind ob scrange ting wa people laan oona ton oona fom de true way. Wen God blessin da mek we haat scrong an courage we, dat good fa true. Bot wen we da folla rule bout wa ting we oughta nyam, dat ain wot nottin ta we. Dat ain hep de people wa nyam dat way none tall.
We bredren, we beg oona fa hona oona leada dem, wa da wok haad dey mongst oona. Dey de one dem dat God done pick fa tell oona wa fa do, an fa laan oona how oona oughta lib.

De man modda an e fada say dat cause dey been scaid ob dem Jew leada. De Jew leada dem done beena gree dat ebrybody wa say e bleebe Jedus de Messiah Christ, dem leada gwine chunk um fom outta de Jew meetin house.

Bot we de people wa been circumcise fa true. Cause God Sperit da hep we woshup God, an we da rejaice een we life een Jedus Christ. An we ain pit no hope een nottin dat people do ta dey body fa try fa show dat dey God people.
Dis wa God chaage we fa do: We fa bleebe pon de name ob e Son Jedus Christ. An we oughta lob one noda, same like Christ chaage we fa do.
Den A see noda beast da come op outta de groun. E been hab two hone jes like lamb hone, an e beena taak like de dragon.
Me Christian bredren, oona mus dohn tink like chullun. Fa true, oona oughta be like leetle chullun wen e come ta ebil, bot oona mus tink like grownop people.
Ef one ob oona da suffa, leh um aks God fa hep um. Ef one ob oona heppy, leh um sing, leh um sing praise ta God.
So den, ya mus dohn neba loss haat. Hice op ya aam wa da droop, an mek ya wobbly knee scrong.

Wen oona da pray ta God, oona call pon um say, “We Fada.” E God, an e da jedge all people de same way, ebrybody by de wok e da do. So den, lib oona life like oona come-yah people een dis wol. Mus hona God een all dat oona da do.
Oona haffa beah all ting, so dat oona gwine do wa God wahn, an den oona gwine git wa e promise oona.
Wen a poson da trus, dat mean fa say e know fa sho dat e gwine git de ting wa e pit e haat pon. An e know dat dem ting wa e ain see, dey dey fa true.
Een de Lawd name, A da chaage oona say, oona mus dohn lib oona life no mo like dem wa ain know God da lib. Wa dem people tink ain wot nottin.

So den, mus dohn leh nobody jedge ya bout wa ya oughta nyam or drink. Dey mus dohn tell oona wa oona oughta do pon dem special Woshup Day ebry yeah or de time ebry mont wen people celebrate de nyew moon or pon dem Woshup Day ebry week.
Cause ob dat, de stanop dey fo God shrone an sabe um day an night een e house. De one wa seddown dey pon de shrone gwine be dey wid um an tek cyah ob um.
Bot Paul gone down an scretch esef oba de nyoung man an hole um tight. An Paul say, “Oona mus dohn git opsot. Eutychus da lib!”
Cause ob dat, A da beah all ting fa sake ob de people wa God done pick, so dat dey too gwine git de sabation wa come fom Jedus Christ an bring um glory wa ain gwine neba end.
Greet one noda wid de kiss ob Christian lob. Leh all ob oona wa blongst ta Christ hab peace dey een oona haat.
Oona mus obey one noda, cause oona hona Christ.

So den, me deah fren, oona mus tek cyah. Mus dohn leh de bad teachin ob dem people yah wa ain lib coddin ta God Law tek oona outta de way an mek oona own haat stop fa trus dem true ting oona been know fa sho.
Oona marry ooman, tek low ta ya husban. Dat how ya oughta do, cause ya da lib een de way ob de Lawd.
Dem elda wa keep on da sin, ya mus buke um out een de open, fo all, so dat de oda res gwine be scaid fa sin.
So den, we mus dohn jedge one noda no mo. Steada dat ebrybody oughta mek op dey mind dat dey ain gwine do nottin wa gwine mek dey Christian broda stumble or fall eenta sin.
Bot all de people wa da do good ting, God gwine praise um an gim hona an peace, fus de Jew people an den de people wa ain Jew.

Dey pit out de red hot fire dem, an de flame ain do nottin ta um. An God sabe um fom dey enemy dem wa wahn fa kill um wid dey sode. Dey ain been got no scrent, bot God gim scrent. God gim powa wen dey fight waa so dey win out oba de sodja dem ob oda country, an mek um ron way.
Las ob all, mus dohn leh nobody bodda me no mo, cause A got de scar dem pon me body dat show A Jedus slabe.

Atta dat, one angel wa got heapa powa pick op a big stone, big like a millstone. An de angel chunk de stone eenta de sea. An e say, “Same way so dey gwine chunk down dat great city Babylon fa broke um all op. Ain nobody gwine see dat city gin.
Bot oona, me deah fren dem, oona mus grow scronga mo an mo een oona holy fait een Christ. An mus pray ta God wid de powa wa de Holy Sperit da gii oona.

Oona mus dohn do tall like de people een dis wol do. Steada dat, ya mus leh God change de way ya tink, so dat all wa ya da do gwine change. Dat gwine mek ya able fa know wa God wahn, wa good, an wa da please um, an how ya kin lib jes like ya oughta lib.
Cause dem oda postle mo betta den me, an A ain fit fa hab um eben call me postle, cause A beena mek de people ob God choch suffa.
Mus dohn lob de wol, needa pit oona haat pon dem ting wa dey een de wol. Ef oona lob de wol, dat show dat oona ain lob God de Fada.

So den, oona ain got no scuse tall fa de bad ting dem ya da do. Dohn mek no neba mind who ya da. Cause wensoneba ya jedge oda people, bot ya keep on da do de same bad ting dem dey da do, ya da jedge yasef.

James, Peter, an John, dem wa people say been de big leada dem een de choch, dey see dat God been bless me fa gii me dis special wok yah fa do. So dey shake me han an Barnabas han, fa show dat we one een we wok fa God. Dey gree wid we dat we oughta go wok mongst de people wa ain Jew, an dey oughta go wok mongst de Jew people.

Atta de sodja dem been nail Jedus ta de cross, dey tek e cloes an wide um fo way, an ebry sodja tek a paat. Den dey tek e robe, wa been mek ob jes one piece ob closs fom top ta bottom, an ain hab no seam een um.
Oona da laan oda people. Hoccome ya ain laan yasef? Ya da tell oda people say, “Mus dohn tief,” stillyet ya da tief?
Ain oona know dat oona body God House, weh de Holy Sperit da lib dey dey eenside oona? Oona ain blongst ta oona own sef. Oona blongst ta God.
De lob ob Christ fa we da rule oba we, cause we know fa sho, dat one man done dead fa all people. An dat mean dat all people done dead wid um.

So den, me Christian bredren, God call oona, too, fa be e own people. Oona mus keep on da study fa true pon Jedus. E de one wa God sen fa laan we bout God, an fa be de head priest wa da go ta God fa we, fa sake ob wa we say we bleebe.

Een all A done do, A show oona dat we haffa wok haad like dis so dat we kin hep dem dat ain hab wa dey need. Mus memba wa de Lawd Jedus esef tell we say, ‘De one wa da gii, e gwine git blessin mo den de one dat da git.’ ”

Leh all people spec de marry life. De husban mus dohn sleep wid noda ooman, an de wife mus dohn sleep wid noda man. God gwine jedge dem wa lib loose life. E gwine jedge ebrybody wa da sleep wid a poson wa ain e own wife or husban.
E bend oba an e look eenside de tomb. An e see jes dem piece ob linen closs dey, wa de two man dem been nyuse fa wrop op Jedus body. Bot dat ciple ain gone eenside de tomb.
Lightnin cut an loud nise staat op, tunda crack an de groun tremble too bad. Since de time wen God fus mek people, de groun ain neba tremble so bad.

Den A git down een front ob dat angel foot fa woshup um. Bot e tell me say, “Mus dohn do dat! A God saabant jes like ya an ya broda dem, all dem wa bleebe de true wod wa Jedus tell we! Ya mus woshup God!”
Bot God hab e Sperit show we dis yah wa e ain neba show people fo now. God Sperit find out ebryting, eben all de secret ting dem bout God.
Gim haaty welcome an rejaice dat e come ta oona, cause e oona broda een de Lawd. Oona oughta gii hona ta people like dat.
Chullun, mus do wa ya modda an fada tell ya fa do all de time, cause God heppy fa see dat ya da do so.

One ting we heppy bout. We know een we haat fa true dat ain by people sense dat we da waak een dis wol, an mos ob all, ain by people sense dat we da do all dem ting wa we da do fa oona. Bot God blessin show we how fa hona oona an waak scraight wid oona.
“Ebrybody wa know wa A done chaage um fa do an do um, dat de one wa lob me fa true. Me Fada gwine lob dat one wa lob me, an A gwine lob um too. An A gwine mek dat one know me mo an mo.”

Fa true, e look like dem people wa beena mek dem kinda rule yah been git sense. Dey say people haffa woshup angel an mek like dey ain wot nottin, an dey say people kin saab God ef dey mek dey body suffa. Bot dem rule yah ain hep people tall fa trol wa dey sinful body wahn fa do.
Dey beena tell de choch people bout hommuch ya lob um. E gwine be a good ting fa ya fa hep um git ready fa go on dey journey gin een de way dat mek God heppy.
Mus dohn hab nottin fa do wid dem foolish aagyment dat people wa ain ondastan nottin git eenta, cause ya know de trouble dey kin end op wid.
So now dat God done moob de kiba fom we face, wensoneba people see we, dey see de glory ob de Lawd da shine fom we. An God Sperit da mek we jes like de Lawd wid mo an mo ob e glory.

So den, since de animal blood got powa fa mek people clean een God eye, dat mean fa say Christ blood wen e dead pon de cross got much mo powa den de animal blood fa clean we haat! De Holy Sperit wa da lib faeba, e gii Christ powa fa offa esef as de sacrifice ta God. E ain neba sin none tall, so wen e dead, dat sacrifice ob esef fa we been jes wa e oughta be. Cause ob e sacrifice, de blood ob Christ mek we haat clean fa true, an we stop fa do de bad ting dem wa gwine mek we dead, so dat we kin saab God wa da lib faeba an eba.
Fa true, God gii dem people dat ain Jew dat same Holy Sperit dat e been gii we wen we bleebe pon de Lawd Jedus Christ. So den, who dat A da, fa tell God say A ain gwine do wa e tell me fa do?”

Oona mus dohn mek de Holy Sperit saaful. Cause de Sperit ob God een oona, dat God maak wa e gii fa show dat oona blongst ta um an oona kin know fa sho dat e gwine keep oona til dat day wen God gwine set oona free.

So den, oona memba dem ting wa dey done laan oona, wa oona been bleebe. Oona mus do wa dey laan oona an mus ton fom oona sin. Ef oona ain wake op, A gwine come all ob a sudden ta oona jes like tief come. An oona ain gwine know de time wen A gwine come.
Me deah chullun, mus dohn leh nobody git oona fa stop folla de true way. De one wa da lib fa do de right ting, dat de one wa right een God eye, jes like Christ right.
Me deah fren, mus dohn bleebe ebry sperit. Test de sperit dem fa find out ef dey come fom God. Cause plenty prophet wa ain taak de trute beena gone out ebryweh.
So den, bredren, A wahn fa mek oona know fa true dat we da tell oona say, dat cause ob Jedus, God paadon oona sin.

Me Christian bredren, dis de las ting A wahn fa tell oona een dis letta. Oona oughta rejaice een de Lawd. Ain no trouble ta me fa write de same ting dem gin wa A been a write ta oona. An e mo safe fa oona ef A do dat.

Ef one ob oona hongry, leh um nyam een e own house, so dat wen oona geda togeda, oona ain gwine bring de Lawd jedgiment pon oonasef. Now bout dem oda bidness, A gwine chaage oona bout um wen A come ta oona.
Pilate tell um say, “Oona tek um an go jedge um by oona own law.” De Jew dem ansa say, “Bot oona Roman law say we ain got no right fa tek no man life.”
So den, set oona haat pon dem gif wa mo betta den all de res. An now A gwine show oona de bes way ob all.

Jedus, e de head man ob de priest dem, an e da gii we jes wa we need. Jedus good fa true een God eye. E ain neba do no sin. E ain got no fault een um. Een de wol, e ain lib like sinna dem. An now God done raise um op high een e place mo high den de mos high heaben.
Ain nottin dat A cyahn do wid de hep ob Christ wa mek me scrong.
God wahn fa mek oona life holy an blongst ta um fa true. E ain wahn oona fa hab nottin fa do wid loose life.
Oona mus keep on da pray all de time. Pit oona haat pon dem ting wa oona da tell God, an tell um tankya.
Wen Moses yeh wa dat man say, e ron way an gone outta Egypt lan. E gone fa lib een a lan name Midian. E been a come-yah poson dey, an e hab two son.
A man ain oughta kiba e head, cause God mek man like esef, an man da gii hona ta God. Bot de ooman da gii hona ta man.
Mus leh de peace wa Christ da gii ya rule een ya haat. Cause God call oona togeda fa be peaceable wid one noda een one body. An oona mus tell God tankya all de time.

God mek all ting an da keep all ting like dey oughta be, so e right dat God mek Jedus all God plan fa um fa be, shru e suffrin, so dat a heapa people gwine be God chullun an hab dey paat een e glory. Jedus de one wa gone head ob dem people dey fa bring um sabation.
Wa ting mek oona fight an aagy mongst oonasef? De ting dem wa dey eenside oona haat, ting wa oona wahn fa sattify oonasef, dey da fight eenside oona an da mek oona fight an aagy wid one noda.
Fa true, people da tote de nyews say some mongst oona een de choch da lib loose life. An dat so bad dat eben dem wa ain know God ain lib dat way. A yeh say one man da sleep wid e step-modda dey!

Ebry kinda test oona hab, dat de same kinda test oda people hab. Bot all de time God do wa e promise fa do. E gwine gii ya scrent so dat ya ain haffa do nottin bad. Jes wen ya wahn fa do dat ebil ting, dat same time dey, God gwine mek ya able fa stan scrong, an e gwine show ya de way fa keep fom do dat wrong ting dat ya been wahn fa do.
A know dat atta A done gone way, some ceitful people gwine come een mongst oona people een de choch, like wile wolf come pon sheep. Dey gwine do some ob oona too bad, an try fa ton oona way fom God.

Cause ob dat, we kin be heppy fa taak bout oona all de time ta de people een dem oda choch ob God people. We kin taak bout how oona still keep on da trus een Christ, an oona still da beah op onda all dat people mek oona suffa an de bad trouble wa come oona way.
Nobody ain neba see God, bot ef we lob one noda, God da keep on da lib dey eenside we haat. An God lob da mek we lob mo an mo, til dat lob come fa be wa e wahn um fa be.

A Paul, A de postle, da write ta de people ob de choch dem een Galatia. Ain no man wa pick me an gii me de tority fa be a postle. Jedus Christ, an God we Fada wa done mek Jedus git op fom mongst de dead an lib gin, dey pick me fa be a postle.
Oona mus study pon Jedus an how e done beah op wen bad people fight ginst um an mek um suffa. Mus study pon um so dat oona ain gwine git weary an ready fa gii op.

Cause jes like we come fa be one wid Jedus Christ wen we been dead like e been dead, same way so, we gwine be one wid um wen God mek we git nyew life jes like e gii Christ nyew life wen e mek um git op fom mongst de dead people.
An dey write gin een God Book say, “Oona wa ain Jew, oona oughta praise God long wid dem wa God done pick!”

God Sperit taak plain say jurin dem las day, some people gwine stop fa bleebe dem true teachin bout Christ wa we bleebe. Dey gwine do wa de sperit dem wa da ceebe people tell um fa do, an dey gwine folla de teachin dat ebil sperit dem laan um.
Ya mus memba de Christian dem dat dey mus pay mind ta dem wa da lead een de gobment an hab tority oba um. Dey mus do wa dey tell um fa do, an be ready fa do all dat good.
Dem people ain wahn fa memba dat long way back dey, God taak an gii de chaage, an de heaben been dey. An God mek de eart outta wata an wid wata.

Cause Christ too done dead one time fa all we sin. De one wa ain neba done nottin wa ain right, e dead fa all dem wa ain do right, so dat e kin bring we ta God. Dey done kill Christ wen e been a man, bot God Sperit mek Christ lib gin.
E been way mo betta ef dey ain neba know de right way wa God wahn um fa bleebe an fa waak, den fa dem fa know de right way an den ton back an stop folla God chaage wa e gim.
We Christian bredren, een de name ob we Lawd Jedus Christ, we chaage oona say, oona mus keep way fom all de Christian dem wa ain wahn fa do nottin an wa ain da do wa we done been laan um fa do.
Sin fus come eenta de wol wen one man sin, an dat man sin done bring det. An sin spread out ta all people an dey all sin, an cause ob dat, all people gwine dead.

Cause dey trus God, wen dey fight ginst oda country dem, dey been able fa win de waa. Dey done dem ting wa right een God eye, an God gim wa e been promise fa gim. Cause dey trus God, dey shet de lion mout so dey ain nyam um.
People mek we suffa, bot all de time God dey wid we. Dey kin knock we down, bot dey ain able fa stroy we.

Ya like a ooman wa ain scraight wid e husban. Oona ton way fom God. Fa sho, oona know dat wen oona lob de ting dem wa dey een de wol, dat gwine mek oona God enemy, ainty? De one wa mek op e mind fa go atta dem ting een de wol, e da mek esef God enemy.
Paul dem gone all oba de arie een Phrygia an Galatia. De Holy Sperit ain leh um go fa tell God wod een Asia.

Bot wa dey write een God Book bout de way God mek all ting right twix esef an de people wa bleebe pon um, dis wa e say: “Mus dohn say een ya haat, who dat gwine go op eenta heaben?” (so dat e kin bring Christ down fa hep we).
De fus angel empty out e bowl pon de groun. Plenty bad sore buss out pon de people dem wa got de maak ob de beast an wa woshup e statue.

Wen de Lamb tek de scroll, de fo ting wa got life dem an de twenty-fo elda dem faddown fo de Lamb an woshup um. Dey all been git haap fa play music een dey han, an gole bowl dem, wa full op wid incense. An de incense yah, dat de pray ob de people wa blongst ta God.
De one wa bleebe dat Jedus, e de Messiah Christ, dat one God chile. An de one wa lob de fada gwine lob e chile too.
We ain oughta git de big head, an we ain oughta mek oda people bex wid we. Fodamo, we mus dohn cobish ting wa one noda got.
Ya mus dohn scold no man wa ole mo den yasef. Reason wid um, an treat um wid hona same like ya fada. An ya mus treat de man dem wa mo nyounga den ya same like ya broda.
Mus lib een susha good way mongst de people wa ain know God, dat wen dey say ya da do bad, dey gwine see sho nuff dat ya da do good. An dat gwine mek um praise God pon de day dat e gwine come.

A been wahn fa wok fa God sommuch dat A beena mek de people wa blongst ta de choch, suffa. So as faa as somebody kin go fa keep de Jew Law dat mek all ting right twix dat poson an God, A done um. Ain nobody kin pint finga at me bout dat.
De offisa aks e saabant dem wa time e been wen e son staat fa git betta. Dey tell um say, “E been one o’clock yestiddy atta noon wen de feba broke an lef um.”

Now den, e been de Preparation Day. De nex day been de Passoba Woshup Day, an de Jew leada dem ain been wahn de man dem body fa stay dey pon dey cross pon dat Woshup Day. Cause dat day been a special big Woshup Day. So dey gone an aks Pilate fa leh de sodja dem broke de man dem leg an tek um down off ob dey cross.

Wen Pilate yeh wa Jedus say, e try fa find a way fa leh Jedus go. Bot de Jew people holla say, “Ef ya leh dis man yah go, ya ain no fren ob de Roman rula Caesar. De one wa say e a king, e de enemy ob Caesar.”
Jedus tell e ciple dem say, “Mus dohn leh oona haat be hebby. Mus trus God, an trus een me too.
Mus dohn be scaid ob oona enemy dem. An dat gwine show um dat God gwine sabe oona, bot dey gwine git stroy.
Oona ain pick me. A de One wa done pick oona, fa go an beah a heapa fruit, fruit wa gwine las. Den de Fada gwine gii oona wasoneba oona aks um fa, ef oona tek me name wen oona aks.

Cause Abel trus God, e offa a betta sacrifice ta God, mo betta den de one Cain mek. Wen God say e heppy wid de sacrifice dat Abel mek, we know God say Abel waak scraight wid um. Eben dough Abel done dead, we still da laan bout wa e mean fa trus God by how Abel been trus um.
People oughta know dat we Christ saabant, an God gii we chaage fa mek people know dem ting bout God dat people ain neba know.
De staa dem faddown outta de sky, down ta de groun jes like fig dem wa ain ripe yet kin faddown wen a big wind shake de fig tree.
So den, me deah Christian bredren, mus dohn woshup idol tall.
Ya mus dohn leh ebil win out oba ya. Ya mus win out oba ebil by de good ya do.
Ya mus keep on da memba ebrybody bout dem ting yah. An chaage um fo de Lawd dat dey mus dohn aagy bout wod dem wa ain mean nottin. Dat ain hep nobody, an e jes stroy de people wa da yeh.
Come close ta God, an e gwine come close ta ya. Oona wa beena sin, oona mus wash ya han dem clean fom sin. Oona people wa wahn fa lob bof de wol an God, mus clean all dem bad ting outta oona haat.
Bot ef oona treat one poson mo betta den noda poson by how de poson look, oona sin. An de Law condemn oona, say oona broke de Law.
God ain call we fa lib loose life. God call we fa lib een e holy way.
God da show fom heaben dat e bex too bad ginst people wa hab sin een dey haat an da do ebil. Dey wickity way da hide de trute bout God fom oda people.
Me deah fren, leh we lob one noda, cause God de one wa pit lob een people haat. De one wa lob, dat one God own chile, an e know God.
De one wa say e da lib een de light, bot stillyet e hate e broda, dat one dey, e still da lib een de daak eben til now.
Wen people hole ya cheap cause ya blongst ta Christ, ya git blessin, cause dat show dat de Sperit ob glory an ob God da lib dey eenside ya.
Atta Paul tell um hey, e tell um all wa God beena do mongst dem people wa ain Jew wiles Paul beena wok dey wid um.
Ain eben one ob oona kin show dat A done sin, ainty? So den, ef A da tell de trute, hoccome oona ain bleebe me?
Den de Holy Sperit say, “A gwine fagit faeba an eba de sin dey done, an how dey broke me law dem.”
cause een Christ e done mek oona rich een ebry way, een all oona say an all oona ondastan een oona haat.
Me Christian bredren, cause ob we fait een we Lawd Jedus Christ an de lob wa God Sperit pit een we haat, A da beg ya fa jine wid me fa pray ta God fa me wid all ya haat.
De crowd ob people ansa say, “Ya got a debil dey een ya! Who dat da try fa kill ya?”

God pick Jedus an sen um fa sacrifice e life een we place. An wen Jedus dead fa we sin, dat de way God paadon people sin wen dey bleebe pon um. Een dis way, God show dat fa true e da do wa right all de time. Op til now e beena pit op wid people sin.
De place dey been cole, so de saabant dem an de gyaad dem been mek a fire, an dey beena stanop roun de fire fa waam deysef. An Peter gone an stanop wid um da waam esef too.

Oona mus pit on all dat God got fa protec oona wen oona fight ginst ebil, jes like sodja dem pit on dey iron cloes fa protec all dey body. Oona mus do dat so dat wen de Debil come wid e ebil scheme, oona gwine be able fa stanop ginst um.
Peter aks Jedus say, “Lawd, hoccome A cyahn folla ya dey now? A ready fa gii me life fa ya!”
So den, God peace, wa we ain eben able fa ondastan, dat peace ain gwine leh nottin warry ya so dat ya haat an ya mind gwine be safe, cause ya one wid Jedus Christ.
One time wid we mout we kin praise we Lawd an Fada God, an noda time we kin bad mout people, wa God mek fa be like esef.

A ain mean de people ob dis wol dat ain know God wa lib loose life, or wa got de big eye, or dem wa da tief, or wa da woshup idol. Ef oona ain been wahn fa hab nottin fa do wid all dem people, oona haffa jes git outta dis wol fa sho.
“A too beena tink dat fa sho, A oughta do all A kin do ginst de name ob Jedus dat come outta Nazareth.

Dey eye ain scraight. Dey wahn fa lib loose life an sleep roun wid ebry ooman dey see. Dey all de time wahn fa sin mo an mo. Dey da draw people wa ain got dey own mind, fa folla um fa do bad. Dey big eye da trol um so dat dey wahn fa git all ting fa deysef. God done condemn um an dey gwine be stroy.

De poson wa git pay fa mind oda people sheep, e ain no true shephud, an de sheep ain blongst ta um. So den, de poson wa de sheep ain blongst ta, wen e see de wolf da come, e gwine ron way an lef de sheep. Den de wolf gwine come een pon dem sheep an grab hole ta one. An de res ob de sheep gwine ron all oba de place.
Me deah Christian bredren, mus dohn fagit dis! All ob oona oughta be ready fa yeh, bot oona oughta tek time fo oona taak. An mus dohn git bex too quick.
Same way so, de Lawd chaage we, say dem wa da preach de Good Nyews bout Christ, dey oughta git wa dey need fa lib cause ob de wok dey da do.
A done come eenta de wol like light, so dat ebrybody wa bleebe pon me ain gwine stay een de daak.
Jedus find dat man eenside God House. E tell um say, “Look yah, ya well now. Mus dohn sin no mo, or sompin mo wossa gwine happen ta ya.”
Een ebryting oona da do, oona mus lob de people.
“Ef oona lob me, oona gwine do wa A tell oona fa do.

So den, look out dat oona ain close oona yea ta de one wa da taak ta oona. De people ob Israel done close dey yea ta de one wa beena waan um een dis wol, an cause ob dat dey ain been able fa scape. Now ef dey ain been able fa scape, fa true we ain gwine scape ef we ton way fom de one wa da waan we fom heaben!
Oona ain been know God, so oona been slabe ta dem ting dey call “god” wa ain no god tall.
Wen God sen e saabant Jedus eenta dis wol, God sen um fus ta oona, de people ob Israel. E sen um fa bless oona, so dat all ob oona gwine ton fom oona wickity way.”
We see all de ting dem dat Jedus done een de country ob de Jew people, an een Jerusalem too. An dey kill Jedus, nail um ta de cross.

Me Christian bredren, A da beg oona by de tority ob de name ob we Lawd Jedus Christ, oona all mus gree wid one noda een de way oona tink an een wa oona wahn fa do. Den dey ain gwine be nottin fa oona fa spute bout.
Fo oona bleebe pon Christ, oona been ton way fom God. Oona been e enemy cause ob de sinful ting oona beena tink an do.

Ya mus ton way fom dem sinful ting wa nyoung people haat kin gim fa do. Try fa do wa right een God eye, an trus een God. An try fa lob all people an lib peaceable. Ya oughta try fa do all dem ting yah, long wid all dem people wa got clean haat an wa da pray ta de Lawd fa hep um.
Wen God done mek Christ lib gin, e mek oona git nyew life too. So den oona mus pit all oona haat pon de ting dem een heaben, weh Christ seddown, da rule at God right han side.
De fus angel blow e trumpet. Hail an fire wid blood been shrow down pon de wol. One tird ob de wol bun op. All de tree dem een dat paat an all de green grass, dey all bun op.
Dey say: “Lawd God wa got powa mo den all, wa been dey faeba, an wa still dey now! We tell ya tankya, cause ya done nyuse ya powa wa mo den all, an staat fa rule oba de wol!
Jedus say, “Ef ya been know wa God kin gii, an who dis yah wa da aks fa wata, ya been gwine aks um an e been gwine gii ya dat wata wa da mek people lib fa true.”
Christ we true life. Wen e gwine come back ta de wol, oona gwine be wid um. An den, jes like dey hona Christ an gim glory, oona gwine hab oona paat een e hona an glory, too.
Bot de ting dem wa write down een dis book, dey write down so dat oona kin bleebe dat Jedus de Messiah Christ, God Son. An ef oona bleebe pon Christ, oona gwine hab true life.

Bot we God own people. De one wa da know God, e da yeh we. Bot de one wa ain God own ain gwine yeh we. So den, dis de way we know who hab God Sperit wa true, an who hab de sperit wa ain taak de trute.

Wen oona wa bleebe geda togeda fa nyam fa show oona lob ta one noda, look how dey da nyam de food. Dey ain got no shame, an dey ain eben tink ob oda people. Dey ain wot nottin! Dey like cloud wa kin git daak jes like rain wahn fa come, bot dey ain no wata dey an breeze kin blow de cloud way dout no rain. Same way so, dey like tree wa ain beah no fruit, eben een de time wen dey spose fa beah. Dat show dat dem tree done dead, an wen people yank um out by de root, dey dead two time oba.
Wen de people see dem miracle de postle dem beena do, dey tote de sick out eenta de screet, an dey lay down pon dey bed an mat dey, so dat wen Peter pass by, e shada gwine cross oba um.
Fodamo, leh oona trus een Christ be like a shield dat oona cyaa. Dis shield yah gwine protec oona, so dat all de bunin arrow dem wa de mos ebil one da shoot ain gwine do nottin ta oona.
Ebryting ya da do, mus do um wid all ya haat, jes like ya da do um fa we Lawd Jedus, an e ain jes fa people.

Look out dat nobody ain gwine staat fa lib a loose life. Same way so, mus look out dat nobody neba stop fa gii hona ta God an ta wa blongst ta God. Dat how Esau done, wen jes fa git one ration ob food, e gii way de blessin dat God been gwine gim, cause e been de fusbon son ob e fambly.
De people holla loud, ansa Pilate say, “No, mus dohn leh dat man dey go free! Leh Barabbas outta de jailhouse fa we!” Now den, Barabbas been a robba.

Dey ain gwine be people dat oda people kin trus. Dey gwine do ting dout dey study pon wa gwine happen cause ob wa dey done. Dey gwine be biggity an lob dey own pledja. An dey ain gwine lob God none tall.
Cause ob dat, God raise um op an mek um hab high place, mo high op den all oda, an God gim de name wa great mo den all oda name.

Wen we tell oona, say we Lawd Jedus Christ gwine come back ta dis wol wid great powa, we ain beena tell oona no story wa schemy people jes mek op. Wid we own eye we beena see Christ wen God show Christ mighty powa.

Dis wa Paul say een all de letta dem wa e write bout dat. Some dem ting yah wa Paul write een e letta, dey haad fa ondastan. An people wa ain know nottin an wa ain got dey own mind, wen dey try fa splain um, dey da twis op de meanin ob dem ting dat Paul say. Same way so, dey da twis op de oda ting dem een God Book. Cause dey da do dat, dat gwine mek um git stroy.
Wen de postle Barnabas an Paul yeh say de crowd ob people been wahn fa mek sacrifice ta dem, dey teah dey cloes fa show dat dey ain gree wid dat. Dey ron quick eenta de crowd an holla say,
Cause A da tell oona say, Christ come fa saab de Jew people, fa show dat God da do wa e been promise we ole people leada dem.
Ef one ob oona tink e da do all wa God wahn um fa do an stillyet e onrabble e mout, e da fool esef. Wa dat one da do fa God ain wot nottin.

Mus memba wa A done tell oona say: ‘De saabant ain no mo betta den e massa.’ De people mek me suffa, an dey gwine mek oona suffa too. Some ob dem beena do wa A laan um, an dey gwine do wa oona laan um.
So den Jedus tell de Jew dem wa bleebe pon um say, “Ef oona keep on da do all wa A tell oona fa do, oona me ciple fa true.
Den de dry drought come eenta all ob Egypt lan an Canaan lan. Plenty people suffa fa true. An we ole people ain been able fa find nottin fa nyam.
A been too heppy wen A yeh say some ob ya chullun da folla de trute, same like we Fada tell we fa do.

Ebrybody mus tek cyah ob e own kin, an specially dem een e own fambly. Ef e ain do dat, dat one like e da say wa we bleebe bout God ain mean nottin tall. E da do mo wossa den somebody wa ain bleebe pon Christ.
So den, leh we go right een ta God. Wid all we haat leh we trus um fa true. Cause Jedus blood done clean we haat so we ain feel guilty no mo. An we e people wa done wash we body een clean wata.
Dey jes beena yeh people da taak say, “Dat man wa nyuse fa mek we suffa, now e da tell all de people, say dey oughta bleebe pon Jedus Christ. E beena try fa stroy all dem wa bleebe pon Jedus!”
A da beg oona fa nyam some ration, so dat oona kin git mo scronga an lib. Cause ain none ob oona gwine loss eben one hair fom ya head. Nottin gwine haam oona.”
Oona da suffa trouble an da beah plenty fa sake ob me name cause oona da folla me. An oona ain got weary. Oona ain stop da folla me.

Tell de man dem wa mo olda, dey oughta be serious an lib so dat people look op ta um. An dey mus be able fa trol deysef. An tell um dey oughta bleebe scrong een de true teachin ob God an lob oda people fa true. An dey mus be able fa beah op wen dey da suffa.
Fo dis time, God ain blame people fa wen dey ain know how e wahn um fa find um. Bot now God da tell all people ebryweh. E da chaage um say dey mus ton fom dey sinful way an dohn do um no mo.
Close ta Jedus cross been some ooman da stanop dey. Dey been Jedus modda, e sista, an Mary wa been Clopas wife, an Mary Magdalene.
Dey done beena pit de cloes wa e weah eenta blood. E name “De wod ob God.”
Bot oona mus tek cyah. Mus mek sho dat jes cause oona free, oona ain gwine mek oona Christian bredren sin ef dey ain know fa sho yet wa ting right.

Dey write een God Book bout how God been gwine mek Jedus git op fom mongst de dead people an lib gin, an dat God ain neba gwine leh Jedus body rot. Een e Book, God say, ‘A gwine gii oona dem holy blessin fa true, jes like A been promise David.’
Wen dat day come, oona gwine know A da lib een me Fada an oona da lib een me, same like A da lib een oona.
Ef we do wa God chaage we fa do, dat de way we kin ondastan dat we done come fa know God.
Dat wa mek me tell oona say, oona gwine dead wid all oona sin. Ef oona ain bleebe dat A de one A say A da, fa sho oona gwine dead wid oona sin.”
A see dat de ooman been dronk wid de blood ob God people, de blood ob dem people wa been kill cause dey tell people say Jedus dey Lawd. Wen A shim, A stonish fa true.
Oona know dat atta dat, wen Esau wahn e fada fa gim dat blessin, e fada ain gim. Cause Esau ain neba find no way fa change wa e done done, eben dough e try so haad fa git dat blessin dat e beena cry.
Plenty people een de crowd beena whispa bout Jedus. Some dem say, “Jedus one good man.” Oda dem say, “No, Jedus ain no good man. E da fool de people.”
De han ob de Lawd, all ob e powa, been dey pon um. An plenty people bleebe pon Jedus an tek Jedus fa dey Lawd.

Steada dat, we all de time da tell people jes wa God wahn we fa tell um. God gii we dis wok fa tell de Good Nyews cause e see dat e kin trus we fa be sponsable fa do um like e wahn we fa do. We ain try fa do wa people wahn we fa do. An God da look at wa dey een we haat.
Bot leh we tell God tankya! God da gii we de victory shru we Lawd Jedus Christ!
Wida ooman wa fa true ain got nobody fa hep um gwine look ta God fa hep. An dat ooman gwine pray jurin de day an jurin de night da aks God fa e hep.
Til now, oona ain aks God fa nottin een me name. Aks God an e gwine gii oona wa oona aks fa. Den oona haat gwine be full op wid joy.
Ef ya been a slabe wen God call ya, mus dohn leh dat trouble ya. Bot ef ya git de chance fa be free, tek um.
Dey da wide people op een group ginst one noda. Dey da do bad ting wa dey head tell um, dout study pon dem ting. An de Holy Sperit ain een um.

Oona mek me stonish fa true! Oona da ton way so quick fom folla God wa call oona. Oona done come ta God cause ob Christ blessin pon oona. Bot now oona da ton ta noda message wa some people say de Good Nyews.
Try fa lib peaceable wid all people an try fa lib a holy life wa show dat oona blongst ta God, cause ain nobody neba gwine see de Lawd ef e life ain holy like God own.

Jedus tell um say, “Tek oona net an shrow um pon de right han side ob de boat. Den oona gwine ketch some fish.” So dey shrow out dey net pon de side weh Jedus tell um. Den dey ain been able fa draw de net back eenside, dey been sommuch fish een de net.
Ef a man circumcise or ef e ain circumcise, dat ain mean nottin. Wen ya da do wa God say, dat wa count mo den all.

Ef e mek somebody able fa courage people, e mus do dat. Ef God gii somebody good haat fa gii some ob wa e got fa hep oda people, e mus do dat wid all e haat. Ef God mek somebody able fa lead oda people, e mus wok haad. An whosoneba able fa hab mussy pon people wa got need fa hep, e mus be heppy fa do um.
Paul aks um say, “Wen oona fus bleebe pon Jedus, de Holy Sperit come pon oona same time?” De bleeba dem ansa Paul say, “No. We ain neba eben yeh bout no Holy Sperit.”
Ef somebody dey dey wa ain do wa we tell um een dis letta, mus memba um an mus dohn mix wid um, so dat e gwine be too shame.

Me Christian bredren, dis wa A mean fa say ta oona. De body ob dis wol wa God mek flesh an blood, dat cyahn hab no paat dey weh God da rule. An nottin dat dead gwine hab no powa fa ton eenta ting wa cyahn neba dead.

Oona mus dohn wok fa food wa ain gwine las. Stead ob dat, oona mus wok fa de food wa da gii life wa ain neba gwine end. Dat de food wa de Man wa Come fom God gwine gii oona, cause de Fada God been show fa true dat e heppy wid me.”
Ya kin aks God fa sompin an God ain gim ta ya, cause de reason wa mek ya aks ain right. Ya aks fa dem ting wa ya wahn fa sattify yasef, no mo.
Oona mus tell we Fada God tankya all de time fa all ting, een de name ob we Lawd Jedus Christ.
Now den, leh we tink bout wa happen ta Abraham. Dey write een God Book say, “Abraham trus God, an cause ob dat, all ting been mek scraight twix esef an God.”
De city ain need no sun fa shine dey. An e ain need no moon. Cause de glory light wa come out fom God an fom de Lamb da light de city.

Bot oona ain da do wa ya sinful haat tell ya fa do. Ya da do wa God Sperit tell ya, ef God Sperit da lib dey eenside ya. An ef Christ Sperit ain da lib eenside a poson, dat one dey ain blongst ta Christ.
An de Jew people, ef dey change dey way an staat fa trus God gin, God gwine graft um back een de place weh dey been. Cause God able fa do dat.
Nobody ain neba yeh dem tell lie. Dey ain neba do no ebil ting.

Bot A da tell ya dis: Wen A da lib coddin ta de Way, A da woshup de God dat we ole people beena woshup. An de Jew people say dis Way yah ain true. A bleebe all de ting dem wa dey een de Law dat God gii Moses, an all dat de prophet dem done write.
Mus dohn owe nobody no debt, cep de debt dat oona mus lob one noda. Dem wa da lob one noda da do all wa de Law ob God say dey oughta do.
De people wa de sun beena bun, dey cuss de name ob God, wa got tority fa stop dem bad ting yah wa mek people suffa so. Bot de people ain wahn fa change dey wickity way an dey ain wahn fa praise God.
One high wall been dey roun dat city, an de wall hab tweb gyate. Tweb angel beena gyaad de tweb gyate. An de name ob de tweb tribe dem ob Israel been write pon de gyate dem.

Bot Christ done mek we free. E mek de Law so e ain hab no cuss pon we no mo. Cause Christ leh um cuss um fa dead pon de cross fa we sake, like dey write een God Book say, “God gwine cuss de poson dey hang pon a tree.”

Oona done yeh bout de way A nyuse fa lib wen A beena folla God like de Jew people da folla God. Oona know A beena mek de people ob God choch suffa too bad. A ain hab no mussy pon um. A beena do all dat A able fa do fa stroy um.
De angel ketch de dragon. E dat ole saapent wa been dey fom way back. Dey call um de Debil or Satan. Dis angel tie de Debil op fa one tousan yeah.
One man name Simon lib een dat city, an e beena wok root dey fa a long time. E beena mek de Samaria people stonish cause ob wa e da do. E tell um e a big leada fa true.
Now A jes wahn fa know Christ an e powa een me life, de powa wa mek um git op fom mongst de dead an lib gin. A wahn fa hab a paat een de way e suffa an een de way e dead,
Mus dohn hurry fa pit ya han pon somebody head fa pray fa um fa go do God wok. Mus dohn hab no paat een de sin ob oda people. Ya mus dohn hab no sin tall een ya life.

Same way so, tell de olda ooman dem dey oughta waak scraight like ooman wa pit God fus een dey life oughta do. Mus dohn bad mout oda people, needa be dronka. Dey mus laan de nyounga ooman dem ting wa good.
So den, de man wa git marry ta e ooman, e da do right. Bot de man wa ain git marry, e gwine do mo betta.
Mus do wa God wod say. Ef ya jes yeh God wod bot ain do wa e tell ya fa do, ya da fool yasef.
Atta dat, Jedus gone all roun Galilee. E ain been wahn fa go eenta Judea, cause de Jew leada dem wa lib oba dey beena look fa kill um.
God de one wa mek oona come fa be one wid Jedus Christ. God gii we good sense. Christ mek all ting right tween we an God. E mek we come fa be God own people an set we free.
Den e pit wata een a basin an staat fa wash e ciple dem foot. E dry um wid de towel wa been tie roun e wais.
A beena fight ginst de people dat folla dis Way, an mek some ob um suffa til dey dead. A beena grab hole ta man dem an ooman dem an tie um op an chunk um eenta de jailhouse.
So den, de people beena spute an tek side ginst one noda bout Jedus.

Tek cyah ob God people wa e gii oona fa tek cyah ob. Tek cyah ob um same like shephud dem da mind dey flock ob sheep. Mus dohn do dat like ya haffa do um. Tek cyah ob um wid open haat cause ya wahn fa do um. An mus dohn do um cause ya hab de big eye fa money, bot cause ya heppy fa true fa saab um.
Sin mek det able fa do people bad, an de law mek sin hab powa.
Look yah! Oona ain pay de people dem wa beena wok pon oona faam. Listen ta dem da cry out ginst oona! Dem wa beena geda crop da cry out. An God wa got powa oba all, e done yeh dey cry.
So den, mus git rid ob all dem ebil ting wa dey een oona life. Mus dohn tell no lie. Dohn be no hypicrit, an dohn hab de big eye. Mus dohn bad mout nobody bout nottin.
A marry ooman ain free fom e husban long as e still da lib. Bot ef e husban done dead, de ooman free fa git marry ta wasoneba man e wahn, long as dat man blongst ta de Lawd.
dey done ton way fom de way ob trute, da say de time wen people wa done dead gwine git op fom dey grabe done pass. Dey da opsot de fait ob some people wa beena bleebe.

Wen we one wid Jedus Christ, ef we git circumcise or ef we ain git circumcise, dat ain mean nottin tall. Bot de ting wa matta mo den ebryting else, dat we trus een Christ. An people gwine see dis wen dey see how we da show lob ta oda people.
An so wen Jedus come fa be all wa e spose fa be, e come fa be de one wa da sabe all dem faeba an eba, dem wa da do wa e tell um fa do.
Leh we taak now bout de money oona gwine geda fa hep God people. Oona mus do jes like A been chaage de Christian dem een de choch dem een Galatia fa do.
Wife, ya mus obey ya husban, jes like ya obey de Lawd.
Wen Jedus taak gin ta de people, e say, “A de Light ob de wol. De one wa da folla me gwine hab de light wa da gii life an e ain gwine neba waak een de daak.”
Bot oona, me deah fren, oona mus memba wa de postle dem ob we Lawd Jedus Christ beena tell oona bout wa gwine happen.
God ain need nottin dat we kin gim wid we han dem. Cause e de one wa da gii all people life an bret an ebryting.
We wahn fa bleebe wa people say. Bot wa God say, dat way mo greata den wa people say. An God de witness, da say dis bout Jedus e Son.
Steada dat, mus leh de Lawd Jedus Christ rule oba we. An we mus dohn pay no mind ta dem bad ting wa we sinful haat tell we fa do.
Cause de Israel people trus God, de wall wa been dey roun Jericho faddown atta de Israel people maach seben day roun um.
God nyuse Paul fa do powaful miracle wok.
Jedus ansa um say, “A da tell oona fa true, ebrybody wa sin, dey de slabe ta sin.
Me deah fren, since dat hommuch God lob we, we oughta lob one noda too.
Ya done show me de way wa da lead ta life. Wen ya dey wid me, ya gwine mek me full op wid joy.’
Til A git dey, ya mus mek sho fa read God Book ta de people, an fa splain um ta um an laan um wa God say.
Plenty time we got trouble ebryweh, bot dat ain mek we gii op. Plenty time we ain know wa fa tink, bot we ain loss we courage.
Bot some oda people beena mek fun ob dem dat bleebe pon Jedus, say, “Dem people done drink tommuch wine!”
Dey been mek de wall outta jaspa stone, an dey mek de city outta pure gole wa beena shine cleah jes like glass.
Den outta dey come dem seben angel wa da bring de seben bad ting wa gwine mek people suffa. Dey been weah clean linen cloes wa beena shine. An gole sash been tie roun dey chest.
Ya mus aks God fa bless de people wa da mek ya suffa. Ya mus dohn aks God fa cuss um. Mus aks God fa bless um.
E foot beena shine jes like brass wa dey been bun een de furnace an den shine um op. An e boice loud jes like a heapa wata.
A done show ya ta um. An A gwine keep on da show ya ta um, so dat dey kin lob me an dey kin lob one noda same like ya lob me, an A mesef kin be dey een dem.”
God ain keep eben e own Son fom suffa. So den, wen God gii e own Son fa all ob we, we kin know fa true dat e ain gwine hole back nottin e kin gii we.
Dey been tell oona say, “Wen dem las day come, some people gwine hole oona cheap, an dey jes gwine folla dey haat fa do de wickity ting dem wa ginst God.”

So den, ya mus dohn tink dat ya mo betta den dem branch wa been cut off. Mus dohn brag bout dat! Ef ya do, ya oughta memba dat ya jes a branch, an no mo. Oona ain mek de root stanop scronga. Fa true, de root de one wa da mek oona stanop scronga.
Now den, we ain da try fa tell oona wa oona haffa bleebe, cause oona stan scrong een oona trus een Jedus. We da wok togeda wid oona fa mek oona rejaice.
One man name Lazarus been sick. E beena lib een Bethany, de town weh Mary an e sista Martha beena lib.
So den, ef somebody ton e back pon dis ting yah wa we da laan oona, dat one ain ton e back pon jes noda man. E ton e back pon God, wa gii oona e Holy Sperit.
Listen how oona kin know ef dey hab God Sperit. Ef somebody say out een de open dat Jedus Christ done come fa be a man een dis wol, dat one hab God Sperit dey eenside um.
Same way so, dem yah mongst oona, dey hab dream wa ain coddin ta de trute, so dat dey lib loose life. Dey da ton dey back pon all tority, an dey da taak bad ginst dem wa got powa an hona een heaben.
Mus dohn do no bad no mo. Mus do good. Mus try haad all de time fa lib peaceable wid people.

Bot oona mus bleebe de Good Nyews fa sho. Mus dohn doubt God eben a leetle bit. Oona mus dohn leh nobody ton oona way fom de hope fa de ting dem wa de Good Nyews mek oona hope fa. Dis de Good Nyews dat oona yeh, an dat all people een de wol beena yeh. An, A, Paul, da wok fa tell people dat Good Nyews.
Den de people pick op stone fa chunk pon Jedus, bot e hide an come out fom eenside God House.
Oona mus be de nyew poson wa God mek fa be like esef. Dat nyew poson gwine treat oda people right an do wa right een God eye.
Dis mean dat God people mus beah op onda suffrin. Dey de people wa da do wa God tell um fa do an ain neba stop fa bleebe pon Jedus.
Bot God mek um git op fom mongst de dead people an lib gin.
A de good shephud. De good shephud ready fa gii e life fa de sheep.
Fa sho, oona been yeh bout how God bless me, da gii me dis wok fa do fa hep oona.

Ef somebody spute wa ya teach, da say wa ain true ta people een de choch an da mek um wide op an tek side ginst one noda, waan dat poson fa stop fa do dat. Ef e ain stop, ya mus waan um one time mo. Bot den, ef e ain pay ya no mind, ya mus dohn hab nottin fa do wid um.
Wen de Jew people yeh dem wod wa Jedus say, dey ain been able fa gree mongst deysef gin.
De poson wa bleebe wa e say, e show dat e been bleebe dat wa God say, e true.
So den, me deah fren dem, cause oona da look fa dis fa come, do all oona kin, so dat oona gwine be at peace wid God an e ain gwine find no sin or nottin bad tall een oona life.

We Christian bredren, dis de las wod wa we da say een dis letta. Pray fa we. Pray dat de wod ob de Lawd gwine spread all oba too quick an people gwine gii hona ta de Lawd an tell um tankya fa e wod, jes like wa happen wen oona yeh um.
We know dat God wa mek we Lawd Jedus git op fom mongst de dead people an lib gin, e gwine mek we lib gin too, long wid Jedus. An God gwine bring we, long wid oona, eenta de place weh e dey.
Ef one ob oona sick, leh um aks fa de choch elda dem. Leh um come pray oba um an naint um wid oll een de name ob de Lawd.
“Wen Moses been foty yeah ole, e mek op e mind fa go see e bredren, de Israel people.
De Jew people done grab hole ta dis man an dey been ready fa kill um. Bot A yeh say e been a Roman citizen, so A gone wid me sodja dem an pull um outta de Jew dem han.

Fus ting ya know, de whole city been een a ruckus. De people grab hole ta Gaius an Aristarchus. Dem two man been fom Macedonia an beena trabel long wid Paul. De crowd tote um an gone quick ta de place weh de people been.
Jedus waak scraight wid God an blongst ta um, bot oona ton ginst um. Oona beg Pilate fa kill Jedus an leh noda man wa been kill people go free.
God ain mek no diffunce twix we Jew an dem dat ain Jew. We all haffa bleebe de same way. An cause dey bleebe, e tek way dey sin outta dey haat.
Ebrybody oughta look eenside e haat good fa see ef e right wid God, fo e nyam de bread an drink fom de cup.

So den, me deah Christian bredren, oona mus stan scrong een de Lawd. Mus dohn leh nottin mek oona doubt. Oona mus keep on da do de Lawd wok all de time. Cause oona know dat fa true, all ting wa oona da do fa de Lawd ain gwine be fa nottin.
So den, A da beg oona fa waak wid Christ jes like A da waak wid um.
God mek um so dat de people ob dis wol ain know um by dey own sense. God nyuse a foolish story fa sabe dem wa da bleebe pon um.

Same way so, oona marry ooman. Ebry one ob oona, pit yasef onda ya husban. Den ef some ob oona husban ain do wa God wod say, ya kin bring um fa bleebe pon Christ by wa ya da do, dout ya haffa crack ya teet.
So den, Christ sen we fa tell oona dis. Wen we da taak ta oona, e like God esef da taak. Fa sake ob Christ, we da beg oona. Come ta God an leh um mek all ting right tween esef an oona.
Bot atta Jedus done dead, God mek Jedus git op fom mongst de dead people an lib gin. E free Jedus so dat e ain suffa de pain ob det no mo. Det ain able fa hab no powa tall fa keep Jedus een de grabe.
Fa true dey da shrow slam an sult de good name ob Jedus Christ. An dat de name wa God been tek fa mek oona be e own people.
E mus dohn be no dronka, an e mus dohn git bex too quick, da do people haam. Steada dat, e mus treat people kindly. E mus dohn like fa aagy. An e mus dohn lob money.
Bot ebrybody wa da drink de wata A gwine gim ain neba gwine git tosty no mo. Fa true, de wata A gwine gim gwine be een um like a spring ob wata wa keep on da gim true life wa ain neba gwine end.”
Bot de one wa da do wa God tell um fa do, dat one show dat God da full um op wid e lob. Dis de way we know fa true dat we lib een God.
Den A see shree ebil sperit wa look like frog. Dey come out fom de dragon mout, de beast mout an de mout ob dat man wa say e God prophet da taak God wod, bot e ain.
Oona da do de right ting ef oona do wa de law een God Book say. E tell we say, “Mus lob ya neighba jes like ya lob yasef.”
Cause fa true, we ain da tell oona bout wesef. We da tell oona bout Jedus Christ we Lawd. An we say dat we oona saabant fa sake ob Jedus.
Oona mus dohn leh nobody fool oona. “Ef good people keep on da waak longside ebil people, den de good one dem gwine be ruint.”

De God ob peace done mek we Lawd Jedus git op fom mongst de dead an lib gin. Fa true, Jedus de head shephud ob de sheep cause e done dead fa we an e blood done mek sho dat de cobnant, wa God mek wid we, gwine las faeba.

So den, wa matta de mores, e dat oona lib de way dat de Good Nyews bout Christ say oona oughta lib. Den ef A come an see oona, or ef A jes yeh bout oona, A gwine know dat oona gwine stanop scrong fa Jedus. A gwine know dat oona all gree togeda fa fight fa de fait dat we wa bleebe de Good Nyews hab.
Wid e powa God done mek de Lawd git op fom mongst de dead people an lib gin. An e powa gwine mek we lib gin too.
Dat mek me memba ya fa keep on da nyuse mo an mo de gif wa God gii ya wen A pit me han pon ya head an pray fa ya.

Dat hoccome eben dem wa dead now, dey done been yeh de Good Nyews. So dat eben dough een dey life een dis wol dey done pass shru de jedgiment wa all people pass shru, dey kin git de chance fa lib fa true, like God wahn um fa lib.
God done buy oona. E done pay fa oona wen Christ dead pon de cross. So now oona e slabe. Mus dohn leh nottin ob dis wol mek oona come fa be slabe ob oda people.
An we mus dohn grumble, like some ob dem people beena do, an de Det Angel kill um.
Cause we ain like plenty people wa da tell oda people God wod fa mek money. Bot cause God sen we, we wa da saab Christ, we da taak scraight wod fo God.
We wa stan scrong een God way oughta beah op wid dem wa ain scrong yet. We mus dohn do jes wa we wahn fa wesef.
An de Lawd mek me bleebe dat tareckly A, too, gwine come ta oona.
Atta dat. A see fo angel dem, da stanop at de fo cona ob de wol. Dey beena stop de fo wind ob de wol wa been wahn fa blow, so dat dey ain blow tall pon de wata or pon de dry groun or ginst dem tree.

Mus dohn waste no mo time da do dem ting wa de people wa ain know God like fa do. Dem man an ooman da waak een de ebil way, da do ting wa dey ain oughta do wid dey body. Oona done dat too. Oona beena folla oona haat da do dem bad ting yah an oda bad ting dem. Oona been dronka an beena hab dem wile paaty. Oona beena woshup op ta dem idol wa oughta mek ya too shame.
Ef poson try fa do dem two people yah bad, fire gwine come outta dey mout an bun de poson an stroy um. So den, dat how de poson wa try fa do dem two bad gwine dead.
Paul ansa um say, “Bredren, A ain been know dat e de head priest. Cause God Book say, ‘Mus dohn taak bad bout a rula ob ya people.’ ”

Bot de dog dem outside de city. Dem people wa da do black magic, dem wa da lib loose life, dem wa da kill, dem wa da woshup dem ting wa dey mek fa deysef, an all dem wa da lob fa tell lie an keep on fa lie, all dem people yah ain gwine set foot eenside dat city dey.

Bot dey some ting dem wa A blame oona fa: Some ob de people dey mongst oona da do de ting dem wa Balaam beena tell people fa do. E beena laan Balak how fa trap de Israel people an mek um sin. E been git um fa nyam meat wa people been offa fa sacrifice fa woshup idol. An e been git dem fa lib loose life.
We Christian bredren, we mus tell God tankya all de time fa oona. Dat right fa we fa do, cause oona fait een Christ da grow mo an mo scronga, an ebry one ob oona da lob one noda mo an mo too.
Oona know dat wen oona ain know God yet, oona git ton way fom de right road an woshup idol wa ain got no life.
Husban, ya mus lob ya wife, jes like Christ lob de choch an done gii op e life fa um.
Ef somebody da do ya bad, ya mus dohn pay um bad back. Ya mus tek cyah fa try fa do dem ting wa right een all people eye.
Mus dohn hab de big head. Steada dat, pit yasef onda God wa got powa, an leh um trol oona. Den e gwine pit oona op high an mek people spec oona wen de time come.

Stillyet, e all de time beena show um who e da by de good e da do fa um all. God da gii oona rain dat come down fom de cloud, an e da mek wa oona plant beah dey fruit wen de right time come. E da gii oona plenty food an da mek oona haat heppy fa true.”

Same way dey ooman. Dey mus be serious ooman dat people kin look op ta, an dey mus dohn onrabble dey mout, da say bad ting bout people. Dey mus be able fa trol deysef an do wa dey spose fa do all de time.
A been lef dat ooman hab a leetle time so e got chance fa ton fom e ebil way. Bot e ain wahn fa change e way.

Now den, Herod been too bex wid de people een Tyre an Sidon. So some ob dem people geda togeda fa go taak wid um. Fus dey mek peace wid Blastus, de man dat look atta all de ting dem een King Herod bighouse. Den dey gone ta Herod an aks um fa mek peace, cause dey food come fom de country weh Herod da rule.
Jedus say, “A ain got no ebil sperit, bot A gii hona ta me Fada. An oona ain gii me no hona tall.
A big wind beena blow an de wata staat fa git rough.
A reckon dat wa we da suffa now een dis time ain nottin tall wen we tink bout de life ob glory wa God gwine show we bye an bye.
Me deah chullun, A da write oona cause God paadon oona sin fa de sake ob Jedus Christ name.

God sabe we an call we fa be e own people, wa lib fa um, da pit um fus een we life. E ain call we cause ob nottin we done, bot fa sake ob wa e done been plan fa do, an cause ob e mussy. Fo time staat, e done been gii we dat blessin shru Jedus Christ.

Wen de leada dem ob de priest dem an de gyaad dem see Jedus, dey holla loud say, “Nail um ta de cross! Nail um ta de cross!” Pilate tell um say, “Oonasef tek um den an go nail um ta de cross. Cause A mesef, A ain find nottin bad wa e done fa mek me condemn um.”
De prophet dem beena taak fohan bout dis sabation, dis blessin yah wa God been plan fa gii oona. Dey beena study pon um good fashion an tek time fa look good fa know bout um.
Plenty people wa ain taak de trute, dey gone out all oba de wol. Dey ain wahn fa say Jedus Christ done come eenta de wol as a man. People like dat ain taak de trute, an dey de enemy ob Christ.
We find out dat dis man yah beena mek heapa trouble. E beena stir op ruckus mongst de Jew people all oba de wol. An e de leada fa de group dey call Nazarene.

De true ting dem ob we fait, wa nobody ain know til God show um, dey great fa sho, an nobody kin spute um. “Christ come eenta de wol een e flesh. God Sperit show dat e been right. Angel dem shim. People been tell de Good Nyews bout um all oba een diffunt nation. Een de wol heapa people bleebe pon um. An God done tek um op ta heaben een glory.”
Big hailstone rain down fom heaben pon de people. Ebry one ob dem been weigh bout one hundud pound. An de people cuss God, cause dem hailstone rain down pon um an mek um suffa too bad.
Bot we da look fa de nyew heaben an de nyew eart wa God done tell we, say we gwine git. All people gwine do wa right een dat wol dey.
De sky roll back an gone way jes like a scroll wa roll op. An all de mountain an all de islant moob outta dey place.

Cause Jedus Christ do wa God wahn um fa do, e offa op e own body as a sacrifice. Jes one time e mek dat sacrifice, an dat sacrifice got powa fa eba an eba. Dat sacrifice mek we all clean een God eye, an we God own people.
All de time wen we da pray ta God, we pray fa oona an tell um tankya fa all ob oona.

Den noda hoss come out. E been bright red. Dey gii de one wa beena ride um tority fa tek way peace fom de wol so dat people beena kill one noda. An ta dat one wa beena ride pon de red hoss dey gii one big sode.
All Christian slabe mus look pon dey massa dem as people wa dey oughta hona een ebry way. All slabe mus do dis, so dat nobody ain gwine taak bad ginst God, needa taak bad bout dem ting we da laan um.
Mus dohn tell lie ta one noda. Cause ya ain wa ya nyuse fa be no mo. Oona done lef de ole sinful life an de ting dem ya nyuse fa do.

Stillyet, one ting oona da do wa A da blame oona fa. Oona leh dat ooman Jezebel, wa say e a prophet fom God, stay dey mongst oona. E da say, by God powa e da laan dem wa da saab me. Bot e da lie ta me people, an dat lie mek um lib loose life an mek um nyam meat wa people been offa fa sacrifice fa woshup idol.

Fo e happen, God Book been say God gwine mek ebryting right twix esef an dem people dat ain Jew, wen dey trus pon um fa true. An fo e happen, wa dey done write een God Book show how Abraham been yeh de Good Nyews wen God tell um say, “A gwine nyuse ya fa bless all de people een de wol.”
Oona fagit God wod weh e da courage oona, ainty? E call oona e chullun, say, “Me chile, ya mus pay tention wen de Lawd punish ya. Mus dohn gii op wen e buke ya.

Oona mus do wa oona leada dem tell oona fa do an pit oonasef onda um. Dey da watch oba oona, cause dey gwine haffa taak ta God bout how dey done. Mus do wa dey tell oona fa do, so dat dey gwine be heppy fa do dey wok. Bot ef oona ain do wa dey say, dey wok gwine gim a hebby haat, an dat ain gwine hep oona none tall.
E stroy de people ob seben nation een Canaan lan. Den e gii e Israel people dat lan fa dem an dey chullun chullun fa dey own.
De one wa da laan people sompin diffunt, wa ain gree wid de true wod dem wa we Lawd Jedus Christ tell we, an wa we da laan people bout how dey oughta waak wid God,
So den, ef somebody come fa laan oona an e ain bring jes wa Christ laan we, mus dohn tek um eenta ya house. Mus dohn welcome um tall.
Cause jes like we git we paat ob suffrin plenty time, wa Christ beena suffa, same way so, Christ da courage we plenty time.

E gwine be a haad time fa dem teacha! Dey beena folla een de way ob Cain. Fa sake ob money, dey beena mek de same mistake wa Balaam been mek. Jes like Korah, dey done ton ginst de one wa been oba um. An jes like Korah done been stroy, dey stroy too.

Bot dem teacha wa ain taak de trute, dey da shrow slam pon wasoneba dey ain ondastan. An de ting dem wa dey know, dey jes wa dey head tell um, dout dem haffa study pon dem ting, jes like wile animal. Dat wa stroy dem teacha yah.

Cause Noah trus God, e pay tention wen God waan um bout ting wa gwine happen. Eben dough Noah ain been see dem ting yet, e done wa God tell um fa do. Cause Noah trus God wod, e mek one big boat so dat e an e fambly kin go eenside um an git sabe, an de wata wa beena kiba de wol ain do um no haam. So Noah fait een God show dat de oda people een de wol beena do bad wen dey ain trus God. An God say Noah been a scraight poson cause Noah trus God.
Atta dey done git de place ready like dat, wid all dem ting een dey place, de priest dem kin go eenside de fus room ebryday, weh dey da do dey wok fa God.
“Oona got haad haat fa true! God ain dey een oona haat, an oona ain da pay no mind ta wa God say! Oona jes like oona ole people. Oonasef ain neba gree fa do nottin dat de Holy Sperit tell oona fa do!

We know too dat de law dem ain been mek fa good people wa pay um mind. Dem law fa people wa ain wahn fa pay um no mind, an fa crimnal dem, fa dem wa ain know God, an fa sinna dem, fa dem wa ain got no hona fa God an tek de ting dem ob God fa mean nottin, an fa dem wa kill dey own fada an modda, an dem wa kill oda people.
A done write een me letta ta oona, dat oona mus dohn hab nottin fa do wid people dat lib loose life.
Bot God bless me fa true. E pick me fom way back fo A been bon, an e call me fa saab um.
Dem ting wa A da do, A ain ondastan. A ain do wa A wahn fa do. Steada dat, A da do de ting dem wa A hate fa do.
Steada dat, laan mo an mo bout we life een we Lawd an Sabior Jedus Christ. Lib so dat oona gwine see mo an mo how God da bless oona. Leh we gii Christ glory now an faeba mo! Amen.

We fool fa Christ, bot oona got sommuch sense fom Christ, ainty? We ain got no scrent, bot oona scrong fa true, ainty dough? People gii oona hona an pit oona way op high. Bot dey ain gii we no hona tall!
Oona mus stan scrong ginst um, an trus Christ mo an mo. Cause oona know, all oba de wol, oona bredren da suffa same like oona.
Oona wa slabe mus do all dat ya massa een dis wol tell ya fa do. Mus dohn wok jes wen ya massa da see ya, jes cause ya wahn fa mek um praise ya. Mus wok wid all ya haat cause ya hona we Lawd Jedus.
“De ten hone dem wa ya been see, dey ten king wa ain staat fa rule yet. Bot dey gwine git tority fa rule like king wid de beast fa one hour.
We ain got de sperit ob de wol eenside we. We got de Holy Sperit wa God sen we, so dat we kin ondastan all dem ting wa God gii we.
Oona wa got plenty ting, listen ta wa A gwine tell ya now. Oona oughta cry tommuch cause ob de suffrin wa da come pon oona!

Oona mus dohn be scaid ob nottin wa oona gwine suffa. A da tell oona, de Debil gwine try oona fa see ef oona bleebe God fa true. E gwine pit some ob oona een de jailhouse. Ten day oona gwine suffa plenty. Bot oona mus dohn neba stop fa bleebe pon me, eben ef dat mean oona gwine dead fa me sake. Cause A gwine gii oona de crown ob life wa ain gwine neba end.

Bot Timothy, ya a man wa da gii ya life fa do wa God wahn, an ya mus dohn hab nottin fa do wid dem ting yah. Try haad fa waak scraight, fa do wa God wahn, fa trus God an lob people. An try haad fa beah op onda all ting an treat people wid a kind haat.

Oona life been full op wid all kinda fine ting dat oona been wahn an got een de wol, an oona beena do all wa oona wahn fa do. All dem ting yah wa oona got fa oonasef, dey mek oona like cow wa done fat, ready fa git kill.
Twenty-fo oda shrone been dey all roun de fus shrone. An A see twenty-fo elda da seddown pon dem shrone. Dey beena weah white cloes, an gole crown been pon dey head.

Leh um git lick an suffa good fashion, an mek e haat hebby, jes like e been mek esef big wid powa an e been able fa hab all kind ob ting. Cause e da taak ta esef say, ‘A de queen, da seddown pon me shrone! A ain no wida ooman. A ain neba gwine weep an wail fa nobody!’

Same way so, oona marry man. Lib wid ya wife wid ondastandin an cyah fa um. Oona know oona wife ain got scrent like a man, so mus spec um. Cause God gii oona togeda wid dem e blessin wa go on faeba. Do dis so dat nottin ain gwine git een de way ob wa oona da pray.
A ain leh no ooman teach, needa hab no tority oba de man dem. Ooman dem mus tie op dey mout.
Oona kin trus God fa do all wa e promise. E done call oona fa folla longside e Son, we Lawd Jedus Christ.

Me Christian bredren, Christ call oona fa come ta um fa mek oona free. Bot jes cause oona free now, mus dohn tink oona kin leh oonasef do jes wasoneba oona sinful haat wahn fa do. Steada dat, oona mus hep one noda, cause oona lob one noda.
Tek cyah den, dat oona da taak an oona da do right, jes like people oughta do dat God gwine jedge coddin ta de law wa da mek people free.
Dey plenty diffunt way fa saab de Lawd, bot all we da saab de same Lawd.
De Jew people, dey de chullun chullun ob dey ole time leada dem wa God pick. An wen Christ come fa be a man yah, e been bon a Jew. Leh we praise God, wa da rule oba all! Leh we praise um faeba! Amen.

Wensoneba we da suffa, we suffa fa courage oona an fa sabe oona. Wensoneba we git courage, dat fa mek oona git courage so dat oona kin beah op fa true onda de suffrin ob dem same ting wa we da beah op onda.
God de one wa da mek we an oona stan scrong, da know fa sho dat we all one een Christ. God de one wa done pick all ob we fa do e wok.
De boice tell Peter gin say, “Wasoneba God done mek good fa nyam, ya mus dohn say e ain fit fa nyam.”
Dem king ob dis wol wa done been lib loose life an got a heapa ting wid um, dey gwine see de smoke wa come fom de fire wa bun op dat city. An den dey gwine weep an wail cause ob um.
Jedus ansa um say, “De one wa lob me gwine do wa A laan um fa do. Me Fada gwine lob dat one. An me an me Fada gwine come ta um an lib wid um.
Wa lob da? Dis wa lob da: Ain dat we lob God, bot God lob we, an e sen e Son fa come eenta de wol fa sacrifice esef fa pay fa we sin so dat God kin paadon dat sin.
Bot ef we da waak een de light same like e een de light, we one wid one noda. An de blood ob Jedus, God Son, da tek way all we sin an mek we clean.
So den, oona ain no slabe no mo. Ebry one ob oona, ya God chile, an cause ya God chile, e gwine gii ya all dat e got fa gii ta e chullun.
Bot wen God taak bout e Son, e say, “O God, ya gwine rule faeba an eba! An ya da rule de right way fa true.
De Jew people ansa um say, “We ain wahn fa stone ya fa none ob dem miracle wa ya done. We wahn fa stone ya cause ya da hole God cheap. Ya jes a man, bot ya da tek yasef fa be God!”

De fire wa mek um suffa ain neba gwine stop da bun. E smoke gwine go op faeba an eba. So dem people wa da woshup de beast an e statue an wa leh dem pit de maak ob e name pon um, dey ain neba gwine stop da suffa. Day an night, dey gwine suffa faeba.”
God een e mussy gii we dis yah wok fa do. So den, we ain gwine leh nottin mek we gii op.
Dat mek we know fa sho wa we da taak bout wen we say, “De Lawd de one wa da hep me. Ain nottin gwine mek me scaid. Cause ain nobody got mo powa fa do me bad, ainty?”

Dem people wa tink e right fa nyam all kinda food, dey mus dohn tink dey mo betta den de people wa ain tink e right fa nyam no meat. An dem people wa ain tink e right fa nyam all kinda food, dey mus dohn jedge dem wa tink e right fa nyam all kinda ting, cause God done welcome um fa be e own.
An A da pray dat God, wa da courage people an mek um able fa beah wa come, e gwine mek oona able fa gree togeda an lib peaceable cause oona da waak togeda een de way ob Jedus Christ,

Jedus ain like dem oda head man ob de priest dem. Dey been need fa mek sacrifice ta God ebry day fa sake ob dey own sin, an den fa de oda people sin. Bot Jedus ain got no need fa mek no sacrifice no mo. E mek sacrifice fa de people sin jes one time an fa all time, wen e offa op e life pon de cross.
Bot wen somebody hab plenty ting bot e ain hab no pity pon e broda dat e see ain got wa e need, dat rich man ain got none ob God lob een e haat!
A da tell oona, we ain neba gii op. An fa sho, we wahn fa go way fom dis body an go lib wid de Lawd.
Me deah Christian fren, oona wa da lib like scranja an come-yah people een dis wol, A da beg oona, mus dohn folla ya haat fa sattify dem ting wa ya body wahn, cause dem ting da fight ginst ya soul.
Gii hona ta all people. Lob all oona Christian bredren. Spec an hona God, an gii hona ta de king.
Moses been tink dat e bredren gwine ondastan dat God sen um fa hep um an set um free fom slabery. Bot dey ain ondastan bout dat.
Oona mus watch out fa dem people wa da do ebil. Dey jes like bad dog. Dey de people dat say all de man dem haffa git dey body cut.
Dey say dey know God, bot de ting dem wa dey da do show dat dey ain know um. Dey wickity fa true, an dey ain pay no mind ta wa God tell um dey oughta do. Dey ain fit fa do nottin good.
A know dey wahn fa please God too bad, bot dey ain ondastan de right way.
E da courage we wensoneba trouble come ta we, so dat de same courage wa God da courage we wid kin mek we able fa courage oda people, too, wensoneba trouble come ta um.
Do all ya kin do fa mek God sattify fa true wid ya, a wokman wa ain got nottin fa be shame fa, an wa da laan people God true wod, een de right way jes like ya oughta laan um.

Dat man wa da fight ginst God, e gwine fight ginst all de sperit an ting dem wa people call dey god an dey woshup um. E gwine pit esef op high, da say e got mo powa den all ob dem ting dey. An e eben gwine seddown een God House an tell ebrybody dat e God.
Oona wa fada, mus dohn say an do ting ta oona chullun wa gwine mek um bex. Steada dat, oona mus laan um de Christian way.
Bot eben wen all dem ting happen ta we, Christ wa lob we da mek we able fa win out oba all dem ting all de time.

We all faddown ta de groun. An A yeh one boice da taak ta me een de Hebrew language say, ‘Saul, Saul, wa mek ya fight ginst me so? Ya da haam yasef wen ya fight me, same like a ox wen e da kick ginst de stick ob e owna.’

‘A know oona da suffa plenty trouble. A know oona ain got much, bot fa true oona rich een Christ! A know too bout dem wa say dey Jew people, bot dey ain no Jew tall. Dey da lie, taak bad ginst oona. Bot dey blongst ta dem wa da folla Satan.
Ef oona lob oda people, oona ain gwine rejaice oba no ebil ting, bot oona gwine rejaice oba wa true.

So den, mus shrow way all dem bad ting oona da do an all de ebil outta oona life. Pit oonasef onda God fa do wa e wahn. An leh de wod wa God plant een oona haat lib een oona, cause e wod got powa fa sabe oona.
A beena plant de seed een oona haat. Apollos wata um. Bot God de one dat mek de plant grow.

One oda angel beena folla de fus one. E da taak say, “Babylon, dat city wa got big powa, done come ta nottin. E beena mek all de nation dem ob de wol drink e wine. Dat wine dey e de loose life ob sin wa kin mek people do wasoneba bad ting dey haat tell um fa do.”
Oona me fren ef oona do wa A chaage oona fa do.
Me deah chullun, mus dohn hab nottin fa do wid no idol.

Cause some dem sneak roun an mek dey way eenta people house an go ton ooman dem haat, ooman wa ain know wa dey oughta bleebe. Dem ooman burden down wid dey plenty sin an dey da do all kind ob ebil ting wa dey haat gim fa do.
Steada dat, we mus lob one noda, da tell one noda wa true. Ef we do dat, we gwine grow op mo an mo een ebry way fa be one wid Christ, de head ob de choch.
De Holy Sperit da gii oona de peace wa mek oona all one body een Christ. Oona mus try wid all oona haat fa gree togeda, so dat oona kin all hab peace wid one noda.
Paul say, “Who ya da, Lawd?” An de boice say, “A Jedus. A de one ya da fight.

Bot woshup Christ een oona haat as Lawd. Be ready all de time fa ansa de people dat aks oona hoccome oona got hope een oona haat. Bot wen oona ansa um, mus dohn try fa force um fa bleebe pon Christ, an show spec ta um.
De Lawd tell um say, ‘Tek ya shoe off ya foot, cause de place dey weh ya da stan, dat holy groun.

So den, fom de fus, oona beena laan de trute bout um. Mus keep all dat een oona haat. Ef dem fus ting wa oona beena yeh stay dey een oona haat, den all de time oona gwine be one wid de Son an wid God de Fada.
A da tell oona fa true, ebrybody wa da do wa A da laan um, dey ain neba gwine dead.”
Den A see one big white shrone an de one wa seddown pon um. De sky an de wol jes gone way fom fo dat one pon de shrone, an ain nobody shim no mo.

Oda people kin say, “Food fa de belly, an de belly fa food.” Dat true, bot God gwine stroy all two ob dem. De Lawd ain mek people body fa lib loose life. E mek people body so dat dey kin saab um. An de Lawd, e de one wa gii people ebryting wa good fa dey body.
Same way so, ya mus look pon yasef jes like ya done dead, so dat sin ain got no powa fa rule oba ya no mo. An ya mus lib now fa please God, cause ya one wid Jedus Christ.

We tell God tankya, cause God mek Christ win out oba de powa ob ebil. An wen we one wid Christ, God all de time da mek we hab we paat wid Christ fa win out oba de powa ob ebil. An God da nyuse we fa spread all oba, wa people oughta know bout Christ, like a sweet smell kin spread all oba.
Dis de message wa God Son tell we an wa we da tell oona. God de light. Ain no daakness een um, none tall.
All dem wa me Fada gii me gwine come ta me. A ain neba gwine ton way nobody wa come ta me.
Oona mus keep on da lob oona Christian bredren.
So den, Jedus got powa all de time fa sabe de people wa come ta God shru um, cause e da lib faeba, fa go fa taak ta God fa sake ob dem people.

Bot de people holla say, “Tek um way! Tek um way! Nail um ta de cross. Kill um!” Pilate aks um say, “Oona wahn me fa nail oona king ta de cross an kill um?” De leada dem ob de priest dem ansa say, “We ain hab no oda king cep Caesar!”
Well den, e de same way so now. Stillyet dey some people lef wa God hab mussy pon an e pick um fa woshup um.
De king dem ob de wol been lib loose life wid dat ooman yah, an de people ob de wol been dronk wid de wine wa e gim fa drink. Dat de loose life wa dey been lib wid um.”
Mus lob one noda like people wa blongst ta de same fambly. An mus be heppy fa gii hona ta ya bredren.
Den all de people wa da leh God Sperit lead um, dey God chullun.
Den A see noda sign op een de sky. One big red dragon been op dey. An e been hab seben head, an ten hone. An ebry one ob e seben head got one crown pon um.

An cause we God chullun, we gwine git de blessin dem wa God beena keep fa e people. An long wid Christ, we gwine git wa God beena keep fa Christ. We know dat de trute, since we got we paat een Christ suffrin so dat we kin git we paat too, een de life ob glory wa Christ got.
Bout de choch elda dem wa da do good wok da lead de choch, specially dem wa da wok haad da preach an da teach, de people ob de choch oughta know, dey good nuff fa true fa git double dey pay.

Bot ain all people know dis. Some people wa nyuse fa bleebe een idol, now wen dey da nyam food dat done been sacrifice ta idol, dey tink dat food stillyet blongst ta idol. Dey ain bleebe scrong nuff een Christ een dey haat yet. So dey tink dey da do wa ain right wen dey nyam dat food.
Ebry wine branch wa been jine ta me bot e ain beah no fruit, me Fada cut um off. An ebry branch wa da beah fruit, e da trim um back so dat branch kin beah mo fruit.
Mus dohn treat dem people like slabe wa God done gii ya fa tek cyah ob. Steada dat, ya oughta do good sommuch til de people deysef wahn fa be jes like oona.
We bredren, we wahn oona fa know de trute bout de people wa done dead, so dat oona ain gwine greebe like de oda people greebe, cause dey ain got no hope een God fa de ebalastin life.
Cause de Israel people trus God, dey gone right shru de Red Sea, jes like dey da waak pon dry groun. Bot wen Pharoah aamy try fa cross oba, dey all been drown een de wata.
Dat same time dey, Moses bon. E been a fine chile. E modda an e fada tek cyah ob um an hide um een dey house fa shree mont.
Cause de head man too, e a man an e kin do wa ain right. So den, e kin hab mussy pon dem wa ain da do right an ain know no betta.

De night mos pass. De day close by now. So den, leh we stop do dem bad ting wa wickity people da do een de daak. Like sodja, wa pit on dey aama een de day, leh we tek op dem ting wa we kin fight wid, an leh we be ready fa fight een de light.

Oona wa massa, oona mus treat oona slabe dem een dat same good way. Mus dohn mek um scaid, da tell um how haad oona gwine be on um. Cause oona mus dohn neba fagit dat oona an oona slabe dem blongst ta de same Massa een heaben. An e ain gwine treat one poson mo betta den noda.
Wen people da rejaice, ya mus rejaice long wid um, an wen people saaful, ya mus be saaful long wid um too.

Bot ya haat mo haada den a rock an ya ain wahn fa change ya way. So den, God gwine mek ya suffa eben mo, wen e punish ya on dat day, wen e gwine show how e bex wid people cause dey da do bad. Dat wen e gwine jedge um scraight, fa true.

Den some Jew come fom Antioch een Pisidia an fom Iconium. Dey taak ginst de postle dem til de crowd gree fa do wasoneba dey wahn. Dey chunk stone pon Paul an drag um outta de city, cause dey tink e done dead.
Wen Jedus done say dat, e haat been hebby. An e taak plain say, “A da tell oona fa true, one ob oona gwine ton me een ta dem wa ginst me.”
